# morpheus_budget (Data Source)

Provides a Morpheus budget data source.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "morpheus_budget" "example" {
  name = "example budget"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- **id** (Number) The ID of this resource.
- **name** (String) The name of the Morpheus budget.
